EmailTemplate.name: Ambassador Request
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are honored that you’d like to be a part of the YETI Ambassador Family! We’ve have been absolutely astounded by the number of requests that we’ve been receiving! While we can't accommodate all requests and only have limited spots, we do have a Pro-Program that we would love to invite you to be a part of where you can receive industry pricing on YETI products to continue to do your job. You can apply for the YETI Pro-Program at https://www.yeti.com/pro-program.html
Thank you for thinking of us, and for being a YETI fan. We wish you the best of luck in all your adventures!
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
